episode.title: 好きな子のめがねを持って帰った
I Brought Home the Girl I Like`s Glasses
Suki na Ko no Megane o Motte Kaetta
episode.summary: When Mie forgets her glasses at school, Komura ends up taking the home for the weekend. To keep them safe. That`s all. Really. He`s only keeping them safe! Source: crunchyroll
